com.ibm.dragonfly

Class ConnectionFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.dragonfly.ConnectionFactory

  • final class ConnectionFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    A connection factory for JNDI Data Sources - Supports TemplateDB and DataDB connections.
    Author:
    Mike Storey
